title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, May 30, 2013
description: While the debate continues over domestic use of unmanned aerial vehicles in the U.S., Germany is considering using drones to stop graffiti artists in their tracks. And which computer sounds are on their way out and which are on their way in?
teaser: While the debate continues over domestic use of unmanned aerial vehicles in the U.S., Germany is considering using drones to stop graffiti artists in their tracks. And which computer sounds are on their way out and which are on their way in?
